page.title: 11School life in Barkestone
page.content: There is a school at Barkestone that was built in 1812.Children from Plungar and Barkestone go to.It starts at 9 o'clock and it ends at quarter past three.At school Mrs Hills our teacher has a timetable which we have to stick to.My favourite subject is maths and I like stories. There is also a school at Redmile that Redmile children go to.At Barkestone children start school when they are four years old and leave at ten years. We have dinners that come from Bottesford primary school but if you don't want dinners you can have sandwiches. At half past ten we have a playtime.This goes on til1 quarter to eleven then we have another one at twelve o'clocktill quarter past one. Every year we have sports day and go on school outings. On Monday morning we have swimming and tennis on Wednesday.
